title: EXP Tracker Update
notes: • Fixed rare EXP/hr spike issue caused by timing inconsistencies
• Corrected next and goal level timers to prevent them from showing 00:00:00
• Improved handling of overflow and spillover experience during level ups
• Smoothed average EXP/hr calculations and added internal history limits
• Debug window now closes cleanly without throwing errors
• Improved PID switching reliability and reset behavior
• General backend stability improvements and safer multithreading
• Added PID switching mid session without having to relaunch client.
• Added GUI position permenance (remains where you place it when relaunching.)
